This guide is for engineers, consultants, and others who want to create custom XML-based rules for {ProductName} ({ProductShortName}) tools.

For more information, see the {IntroToMTABookName} for an overview and the {UserCLIBookName} for details.

To contribute to the {ProductShortName} source code base or provide Java-based rule add-ons, see the {CoreDevelopmentBookName}.

windup-documentation is maintained by windup.
